definitions: relating to a process of testing or observing the character or abilities of a person who is new to a role or job

examples.text: she recently completed her two-year probationary period with the police

shortDefinitions: relating to process of testing person who is new to role

definitions: relating to the release of an offender from detention subject to a period of good behavior under supervision

examples.text: he received a two-year probationary sentence

shortDefinitions: relating to release of offender from detention subject to period of good behaviour under supervision
